channel.title: Strixhaven: Your Acceptance Letter: Gauntlet Blog
channel.description:
On the Gauntlet Blog, I present a campaign starter letter for incoming students to this school of magic. Find set up, instructions, and a potential class list for this D&D 5E setting based on the recent *Magic: the Gathering* set.
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/strixhaven-your-acceptance-letter

item.title: Strixhaven: Your Acceptance Letter: Gauntlet Blog
item.dc:creator: @edige23
item.description:
@edige23 wrote:

On the Gauntlet Blog, I present a campaign starter letter for incoming students to this school of magic. Find set up, instructions, and a potential class list for this D&D 5E setting based on the recent Magic: the Gathering set.

THE GAUNTLET

Strixhaven: Your Acceptance Letter

We started our Strixhaven campaign recently. We're doing 8 sessions using Dungeons and Dragons 5th Edition . To kick things off I presented the characters with a letter from the mysterious acting...

Read full topic
item.source: Strixhaven: Your Acceptance Letter: Gauntlet Blog
